txt.en: Thorin can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou should deliver the meat to Thorin.
Deliver the meat to Thorin at Amdân

'It is indeed a boon that the beasts of Azanulbizar have not also abandoned the dale since the fall of Khazad-dûm.

'The Orcs are many, and though we and our cousins are hardy folk, it will take a great effort and a great supply of meat to feed the Haban'akkâ.

'If even a few of our warriors could hunt moose, deer, and boar in the course of their duties, it would ease our burden. Will you aid us, Hermáth?'
The Haban'akkâ of Thráin has need to hunt the many beasts of Azanulbizar that their meat might feed an army.
'Well done, my friend. There remain many mouths to feed at Amdân, but our warriors will eat their fill this night!'
Moose, deer, and wild boar can be found throughout the woods of Azanulbizar.\n\nThorin has asked you to hunt the beasts of Azanulbizar for meat to feed the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.
